summary: A new beautiful buyable and upgradeable player home in Solitute.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://s15.postimg.org/j51rd20gr/Untitled_1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s8.postimg.org/towo8y77p/image.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s11.postimg.org/zftdb4srn/image.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s28.postimg.org/qypcxkayl/image.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s13.postimg.org/pejnwi1vr/image.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s2.postimg.org/q4gibq9kp/image.jpg[/img]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]          
             This is a new player home in Solitude. This mod expands the city a bit to make room for the house. It has a beautiful lore friendly exterior and it feels like it was build there when the city was build, with an artistic touch. Inside you will find alchemy and enchanting tables, a few storage chests, weapon racks, book shelf's and a mannequin, all surrounded in a cozy and nice atmosphere. [color=#cc4125]Of course you need to buy the home from an custom voiced NPC located inside the Blue Palace (Nedwin Sharprock), you can't miss him.[/color][/size][/font]

[u][b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=6]Installation[/size][/font][/b][/u]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]This mod should not conflict with any mod out there, except a mod that modifies the area where the house is located. Install if via the NMM or manually by dropping the data folder in your Skyrim install directory.[/size][/font]
author: Same Dee
